title: Baklust
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, European, Dutch
description: Small lunchroom offering sandwiches, cakes, savory dishes, weekly specials, and coffee. Dinner food and takeaway is available later in the day. Biodegradable ware is used for takeaway, or bring your own containers. Situated in the city centre next to a canal, a 15 minute walk from both train stations, and tram 17 stops next door.
